frontmatter.author: Ajda Pretnar
frontmatter.title: Aggregate, Group By and Pivot with... Pivot Table!
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: Orange's brand new Pivot Table widget with many aggregation and grouping functionalities.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: Orange has a brand new Pivot Table widget with many aggregation and grouping functionalities. It can be used to transform the data on-the-fly and use the output for downstream analysis.
